Activity â€“ Determining the Network Address (Advanced)

In this activity, you are given the host address, subnet mask, host address (in binary format), and subnet mask (in binary format).

Enter the network address in binary and decimal format in the octet fields.
You have correctly converted the network address to binary and decimal. Click New Number to continue.
You have not correctly converted the network address to binary and/or decimal. Click Reset to try again.
You have not correctly converted the network address to binary and/or decimal. Click Reset to try again.
You have not correctly converted the network address to binary and/or decimal. Click Reset to try again.
